SEARCH
Package ms.logic.operation

Class RevealOperation

java.lang.Object
ms.logic.operation.RevealOperation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameOperation
public class RevealOperation extends Object implements GameOperation
The RevealOperation class implements the GameOperation interface to handle revealing cells in a Minesweeper game. It manages the logic for revealing cells, handling mine reveals, and cascading reveals.

  • Constructor Details

    • RevealOperation

      public RevealOperation(MineField mineField, GridDimension dimensions, GameStatistics stats, GameStatusManager statusManager, Timer timer)
      Constructor for RevealOperation.
      Parameters:
      mineField - The minefield containing the cells to be revealed.
      dimensions - The dimensions of the grid.
      stats - The game statistics to track revealed cells and game status.
      statusManager - The manager for handling game status changes.
      timer - The timer for tracking game time.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(Position position)
      Executes the reveal operation on the specified position. If the cell is mined, it handles the mine reveal logic. If the cell is not mined, it reveals the cell and cascades reveals if necessary.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface GameOperation
      Parameters:
      position - The position of the cell to be revealed.
